title: HEAL DAMAGED HAIR WITH REPAIRNG CARE | GARNIER WHOLE BLENDS
description: Learn how you can treat damaged, delicate hair to the healing, strengthening care of Garnier's new hair-repairing formula WHOLE BLENDS HONEY TREASURES. Infused with the essences of royal jelly, honey, and propolis extracts, it protects hair from breakage and  rejuvenates hair to the ends.

asset.author: GarnierUSA
